H0.text: In 2006, Stephen Harper became the Prime Minister of which country. Australia

H1.text: In 2006, Stephen Harper became the Prime Minister of which country. United Kingdom

H2.text: In 2006, Stephen Harper became the Prime Minister of which country. New Zealand

H3.text: In 2006, Stephen Harper became the Prime Minister of which country. ᑲᓇᑕ

A4.text: Stephen Joseph Harper (born April 30, 1959) is a Canadian politician who served as the 22nd prime minister of Canada from 2006 to 2015.
